# ClosedRange.Indices

**Type Alias**

A type that represents the indices that are valid for subscripting the collection, in ascending order.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Indices = DefaultIndices<ClosedRange<Bound>>
```
title: ClosedRange.Indices
